mapper.select: SELECT * from jy_shiping_order left join jy_agreementtoorder on jy_shiping_order.shiping_order_id = jy_agreementtoorder.order_id left join jy_create_agreement ON jy_create_agreement.agreement_id=jy_agreementtoorder.agreement_id left join jy_order_custom on jy_shiping_order.custom_id = jy_order_custom.custom_id where jy_create_agreement.agreement_type=1 ORDER BY jy_shiping_order.updatetime DESC

SELECT * from jy_shiping_order left join jy_agreementtoorder on jy_shiping_order.shiping_order_id = jy_agreementtoorder.order_id left join jy_create_agreement ON jy_create_agreement.agreement_id=jy_agreementtoorder.agreement_id left join jy_company on jy_create_agreement.company_id = jy_company.company_id where jy_create_agreement.agreement_type=2 ORDER BY jy_shiping_order.updatetime DESC
select * from jy_user

select count(*) from jy_shiping_order left join jy_agreementtoorder on jy_shiping_order.shiping_order_id = jy_agreementtoorder.order_id left join jy_create_agreement ON jy_create_agreement.agreement_id=jy_agreementtoorder.agreement_id left join jy_company on jy_create_agreement.company_id = jy_company.company_id where 1=1 and jy_create_agreement.agreement_type=2 and jy_shiping_order.shiping_check = 1
and jy_shiping_order.shiping_order_num like "%${param1}%"
and jy_shiping_order.receipt like "%${param2}%"
and jy_shiping_order.fee_date >=#{param3}
and jy_shiping_order.fee_date <=#{param4}
and jy_create_agreement.create_time like "%${param5}%"
and jy_create_agreement.create_time like "%${param6}%"

and jy_shiping_order.send_station like "%${param8}%"
and jy_shiping_order.goods_name like "%${param9}%"
and jy_shiping_order.goods_num like "%${param10}%"
and jy_shiping_order.pay_type like "%${param11}%"
and jy_shiping_order.paid like "%${param12}%"
and jy_company.company_name like "%${param13}%"
and jy_shiping_order.fee_date >=#{param3} and jy_shiping_order.fee_date <=#{param4}
and jy_create_agreement.create_time >=#{param5} and jy_create_agreement.create_time <=#{param6}

update jy_shiping_order
write_off1=#{param2},
send_remarks1=#{param3},
send_date=#{param4},
people_song=#{param5},
where shiping_order_id = #{param1}

change_write_off=#{param2},
change_check_time=#{param3},

close_recheck_state =0,

change_card=#{param7},
change_sige_name=#{param8},
change_stata_cen = 1, change_recheck_state = 0
where shiping_order_id = #{param1}

( #{item.laiyuan}, #{item.happen_date}, #{item.subject}, #{item.subject_two}, #{item.subject_three}, #{item.money}, #{item.remarks}, #{item.shiping_order_num}, #{item.customer_name}, #{item.consignee}, #{item.id}, #{item.mingxi_id}, #{item.company_id}, #{item.company_name}, #{item.car_name}, #{item.people_song} )

mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT jc.company_id
from jy_shiping_order jso left join jy_agreementtoorder ja on jso.shiping_order_id = ja.order_id left join jy_create_agreement jca ON jca.agreement_id=ja.agreement_id left join jy_company jc on jca.company_id = jc.company_id where 1=1 and jca.agreement_type=2 AND jso.change_write_off!='3' AND jso.change_write_off !=0
and jso.shiping_order_num like "%${param1}%"
and jso.receipt like "%${param2}%"
and jso.fee_date >=#{param3}
and jso.fee_date <=#{param4}
and jca.create_time like "%${param5}%"
and jca.create_time like "%${param6}%"
and jso.write_off like "%${param7}%"
and jso.send_station like "%${param8}%"
and jso.goods_name like "%${param9}%"
and jso.goods_num like "%${param10}%"
and jso.pay_type like "%${param11}%"
and jso.paid like "%${param12}%"
and jc.company_name like "%${param13}%"
and jso.fee_date >=#{param3} and jso.fee_date <=#{param4}
and jca.create_time >=#{param5} and jca.create_time <=#{param6}
GROUP BY jc.company_id ) AS pp

SELECT jy_shiping_order.*,jy_company.*,jy_create_agreement.* from jy_shiping_order left join jy_agreementtoorder on jy_shiping_order.shiping_order_id = jy_agreementtoorder.order_id left join jy_create_agreement ON jy_create_agreement.agreement_id=jy_agreementtoorder.agreement_id left join jy_company on jy_create_agreement.company_id = jy_company.company_id where 1=1 and jy_create_agreement.agreement_type=2 AND jy_shiping_order.change_write_off!=3 AND jy_shiping_order.change_recheck_state !=2 AND jy_company.company_id = #{param3}
GROUP BY jy_shiping_order.shiping_order_id

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT jy_shiping_order.shiping_order_id from jy_shiping_order left join jy_agreementtoorder on jy_shiping_order.shiping_order_id = jy_agreementtoorder.order_id left join jy_create_agreement ON jy_create_agreement.agreement_id=jy_agreementtoorder.agreement_id left join jy_company on jy_create_agreement.company_id = jy_company.company_id where 1=1 AND jy_create_agreement.agreement_type=2 AND jy_company.company_id =#{param1} AND jy_shiping_order.change_write_off!=3 GROUP BY jy_shiping_order.shiping_order_id )AS q
mapper.update:
UPDATE jy_shiping_order
arraign_time =SYSDATE(), arraign_name = #{param2}, arraign_department= #{param3}, change_check_remarks= #{param4}, change_recheck_state=3, arraign_state = 1
WHERE shiping_order_id in
#{item}
mapper.select: SELECT jy_company.company_id, sum(jy_shiping_order.change_fee) AS change_fee, SUM(jy_shiping_order.paid_chayi) AS paid_chayi, SUM(jy_shiping_order.change_pay) AS change_pay, SUM(jy_shiping_order.change_fee1) AS change_fee1 , SUM(jy_shiping_order.change_other) AS change_other , jy_create_agreement.create_time, jy_shiping_order.*,jy_company.*,jy_create_agreement.* from jy_shiping_order left join jy_agreementtoorder on jy_shiping_order.shiping_order_id = jy_agreementtoorder.order_id left join jy_create_agreement ON jy_create_agreement.agreement_id=jy_agreementtoorder.agreement_id left join jy_company on jy_create_agreement.company_id = jy_company.company_id where 1=1 and jy_create_agreement.agreement_type=2 AND jy_shiping_order.write_off!='3' and jy_company.company_id =#{_parameter} GROUP BY jy_company.company_id
